@no_kaust for me "being apologetic" is the most important part, they should understand they are inconveniencing you and asking for something relatively unreasonable - if it's an "NDA to enter the door" shop... well... I personally have avoided those

It is very satisfying to watch the little electoral votes zoom between configurations #CWF https://t.co/cDbtrzP8ie
This is what it looks like if you make every electoral vote the letters of the state it belongs to and then make them dance https://t.co/UY0dKHVvyA
Now that we have every electoral vote as a circle, we can arrange them by their partisan lean or put them in a grid or a scatterplot or anything we want, really https://t.co/PX2mVk94v4

Oh boy, now we have each electoral vote trying to get to the center of the state it belongs to. The beginnings of an electoral vote cartogram, maybe? https://t.co/UjuUaUoRUi #CWF https://t.co/oPl15q3LrN

Live now at https://t.co/i4A5ndsCZ2 - @enjalot is working on making some unit charts of electoral college votes (which we will move around and filter to our desire in a bit) #CWF https://t.co/Gahldo6Dgc

Auto-tune is basically the closest thing to having an awesome idea in your mind and having it turned awesome using computers.
Awesome list of where to watch TV shows online, might help @kevinrose on his no-TV quest. I've been on it since birth... hippy parents.<3
I'd totally go for any chick wearing these tights: http://is.gd/40CB | THAT'S RIGHT I READ NOTCOUTURE. I SAID IT.
Officially tired of Paper Planes remixes.
Trying to finally put a track list down for the Patterns & Stages EP... ugh. Choosing is hard.
FUCK IT I CAN MAKE COOL BEATS AND THEN SING AUTO-TUNE SHIT OVER IT. MAKE ME FAMOUS GOD DAMN IT.
By the way, the video for T-Pain's Chopped & Screwed is awesome. -> http://is.gd/40sP
I've been using Auto-Tune off and on for the last week or so. And it's so crazy to me that T-Pain has made a career OBVIOUSLY using it...
Reading a story about phantom phone vibrations- I've definitely had these...  In it, Scott Adams and Fred Wilson. http://tinyurl.com/29p544
Feel like shit...
Talking to HTS people about HTS stuff.
Trying to find a good game of Call of Duty. Stupid internets. Wish I had a 360.
Waking up. Very much wanting some chicken. Weird.
Going to sleep listening to Stephen Colbert's new audiobook. Mmm. Political satire.
Made this in a tired stupor - http://tinyurl.com/23xr7a
Checking out the latest match of Layer Tennis. Think I'ma download some elements and mix 'em up myself...
Finding old friends because current ones are not being very exciting at 10:30 on friday.
Watching Kid Nation. Man I love Kid Nation.
I used to own at CoD... what happened?
